entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:50 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:50 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
